name: Emoji Factory
description:
"Here at the Mugpages Emotion Factory we pride ourselves on efficiency and teamwork. It ain’t an easy job, fixing up all those emojis and shipping them out to the customers, but its an honest livin’. Someone’s gotta help all those folk pretend they care about the worlds problems. Or cast their vote on obscure meme-culture polls. So long as my team can pump out those little emojis then we’ve done our job. But we got a reputation to keep. So don’t go screwin’ it up. Or you’re fired." A fast paced game about fixing emojis. Broken emojis will appear on the top of the screen - click the correct fragment below. As your score gets higher, your available timer decreases - don't dally!

Originally created for the 2020 Global Game Jam.
